Fries.name: Fries
steps:
fry the potatoes in the oil
season it with the seasoning

batataVada.name: Batata Vada
steps: Heat a pan with 1 tbsp oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chilies.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute. Then add turmeric powder and mashed potatoes.
Mix well, season with salt, and cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and let it cool.
Make small balls from the potato mixture and set aside.
For the batter, mix gram flour, red chili powder, a pinch of baking soda, and salt with water to make a thick batter.
Heat oil in a deep pan. Dip the potato balls in the batter and deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve hot with chutney or fried green chilies.

biryani.name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Fresh coriander and mint leaves (for garnish)
steps: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, and salt for 1 hour.
Cook the rice with whole spices until 80% done and set aside.
Heat ghee and fry onions until golden brown. Set aside half for garnish.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft, then add the marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Layer half the rice in a pot, add the chicken mixture, and top with the remaining rice.
Garnish with fried onions, coriander, and mint. Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with raita.

dalTadka.name: Dal Tadka
steps: Pressure cook toor dal with turmeric powder and salt until soft.
Heat ghee and sauté cumin seeds, garlic, and onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes and spices, and cook until the oil separates.
Pour the tempering over the cooked dal and mix well.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or chapati.

dosa.name: Dosa
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds separately for 6-8 hours.
Grind rice and dal to a smooth batter. Mix and ferment overnight.
Add salt to the fermented batter and stir well.
Heat a tawa, pour a ladleful of batter, and spread in a circular motion.
Cook until crispy and serve hot with chutney and sambar.

gobiManchurian.name: Gobi Manchurian
steps: Make a batter with corn flour, all-purpose flour, salt, and water. Dip the cauliflower florets in the batter and deep fry until golden.
In a separate pan, heat oil and sauté green chilies and ginger-garlic paste.
Add soy sauce, ketchup, red chili sauce, and vinegar. Cook for 2 minutes.
Toss the fried cauliflower florets in the sauce and mix well.
Serve hot, garnished with spring onions.

idli.name: Idli
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds for 6-8 hours.
Grind the rice and dal to a smooth batter. Ferment overnight.
Add salt to the batter and pour into greased idli molds.
Steam for 10-12 minutes until soft and fluffy.
Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

jalebi.name: Jalebi
steps: Prepare the batter by mixing flour, corn flour, baking powder, and water. Let it ferment for 6 hours.
Make sugar syrup by boiling sugar, water, and saffron.
Heat ghee in a pan and pour the batter in a spiral shape using a piping bag.
Fry until golden and dip in sugar syrup for a few seconds.
Serve hot.

kheer.name: Kheer
steps: Boil milk in a large pot. Add washed rice and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Add sugar and stir until it dissolves.
Add chopped cashews, almonds, and cardamom powder.
Cook for another 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
Serve hot or chilled.

carbonara.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, cook the pancetta or bacon until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Add garlic to the pan and sauté for 1 minute.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan, then mix in the egg and cheese mixture quickly. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs.
Stir in the crispy pancetta and season with salt and black pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

croissant.name: Croissant
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and yeast. Add warm milk and melted butter, then knead into a dough.
Let the dough rise until doubled in size.
Roll out dough and fold in chilled butter. Roll and fold several times to create layers.
Cut into triangles, roll up, and shape into croissants.
Let rise again and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.
Cool before serving.

dumplings.name: Chinese Dumplings
steps: Mix flour and water to make dough. Let it rest.
Combine pork, cabbage, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roll out dough and cut into circles. Fill with pork mixture and fold.
Steam or pan-fry dumplings until cooked through.
Serve with dipping sauce.

gnocchi.name: Potato Gnocchi
steps: Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
Mix with flour, egg, salt, and nutmeg to form dough.
Roll into logs, cut into pieces, and press with a fork.
Cook gnocchi in boiling water until they float.
Toss with melted butter and sage.

chickenAdobo.name: Chicken Adobo
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook onions until soft.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Add water, bay leaves, and peppercorns.
Simmer until chicken is tender and sauce is reduced.
Serve with rice.

ratatouille.name: Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook onion and garlic until softened.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook until tender.
Stir in tomato sauce, thyme, and basil.
Simmer for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot or cold as a side dish or main course.

shawarma.name: Shawarma
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, shawarma spice mix, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until fully cooked.
Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce, pickles, and vegetables.

tacos.name: Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for topping
steps: Cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water. Simmer until well combined.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

pho.name: Pho
steps: Char onion and ginger in a hot pan until fragrant.
Add spices and beef broth. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Strain the broth and return to pot. Add beef slices and cook briefly.
Prepare rice noodles according to package instructions.
Serve hot broth over noodles with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, lime, chili, and fish sauce.

sushi.name: Sushi
ingredients: Wasabi and pickled ginger for serving
steps: Rinse rice until water runs clear. Cook in a rice cooker with water.
Mix rice vinegar and sugar. Stir into cooked rice and cool.
Place rice on nori sheets and add fish slices.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

babaGanoush.name: Baba Ganoush
steps: Roast eggplants until tender and charred. Cool and peel.
Blend eggplants with tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil and garnish with parsley.
Enjoy with pita bread or vegetables.

bruschetta.name: Bruschetta
steps: Toast baguette slices until crisp.
Mix tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Top toasted baguette slices with tomato mixture.
Serve immediately.

cannoli.name: Cannoli
steps: Mix ricotta, mascarpone, powdered sugar, and vanilla.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Fill cannoli shells with the mixture.
Chill before serving.

caponata.name: Caponata
steps: Sauté eggplant, onion, and bell pepper until softened.
Add tomato sauce, vinegar, olives, capers, and sugar.
Simmer for 20 minutes until flavors meld.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm or cold as a side dish.

poutine.name: Poutine
steps: Cook French fries according to package instructions.
Heat beef gravy until hot.
Place fries on a plate and top with cheese curds.
Pour hot gravy over the fries and cheese.
Serve immediately.

potatoSalad.name: Potato Salad
steps: Boil potatoes until tender. Drain and cool.
Mix mayonnaise and mustard in a bowl.
Add potatoes, red onion, celery, salt, and pepper.
Gently toss to combine.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

baklava.name: Baklava
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Layer phyllo dough in a baking dish, brushing each layer with melted butter.
Sprinkle walnuts between layers.
Cut into diamond shapes and bake for 45 minutes.
Boil sugar, water, honey, vanilla, and lemon juice for 10 minutes.
Pour syrup over hot baklava.
Cool before serving.

risotto.name: Risotto
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add rice and cook until lightly toasted.
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed.
Add broth gradually, stirring frequently, until rice is tender.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

paella.name: Paella
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan and cook chicken and chorizo until browned.
Add onion, bell pepper, and garlic, and cook until softened.
Stir in rice, paprika, and saffron.
Add tomato sauce and chicken broth. Simmer until rice is cooked.
Add shrimp and peas, and cook until shrimp are pink.
Serve hot.

fettuccineAlfredo.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and add garlic. Cook until fragrant.
Stir in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Add Parmesan cheese and cook until sauce is thickened.
Toss pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

kimchi.name: Kimchi
steps: Cut cabbage into quarters and sprinkle with sea salt. Let sit for 2 hours.
Rinse cabbage thoroughly and drain.
Mix ginger, garlic, fish sauce, sugar, and red pepper flakes to make the paste.
Combine paste with cabbage, radish, and green onions.
Pack into a jar and let ferment at room temperature for 2-3 days.
Refrigerate and serve.

chickenTikkaMasala.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala for 1 hour.
Cook chicken in oil until browned and set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and cooked chicken.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro.

tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
steps: Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold in mascarpone cheese.
Whip cream until stiff peaks form and fold into mascarpone mixture.
Combine coffee and liqueur and dip ladyfingers.
Layer ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture in a dish.
Dust with cocoa powder and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.

beefBourguignon.name: Beef Bourguignon
steps: Toss beef in flour and brown in olive oil.
Remove beef and cook onion, garlic, and carrots.
Add wine, broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaf.
Return beef to pot and simmer for 1.5 hours.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

brisket.name: Brisket
steps: Rub brisket with paprika, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan and brown brisket on all sides.
Transfer to a slow cooker and add onion, garlic, broth, barbecue sauce, and brown sugar.
Cook on low for 8 hours or until tender.
Slice and serve with cooking juices.

zucchiniBread.name: Zucchini Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
In another bowl, whisk sugar, brown sugar, oil, and eggs.
Stir in zucchini and then mix with dry ingredients.
Pour batter into loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

shakshuka.name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat oil and cook onion, garlic, and bell pepper until softened.
Add tomato sauce, cumin, paprika, and chili powder.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with bread.

cabbageRolls.name: Cabbage Rolls
steps: Blanch cabbage leaves in boiling water until pliable.
Mix beef, rice, onion, and egg.
Place filling in cabbage leaves and roll up.
Place rolls in a baking dish.
Mix tomato sauce with brown sugar and pour over rolls.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour.

souffle.name: Soufflé
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
In another bowl, mix egg yolks, sugar, flour, butter, milk, and vanilla.
Fold in egg whites gently.
Pour into greased ramekins and bake for 15-20 minutes.
Serve immediately.

empanadas.name: Empanadas
steps: Cook beef with onion, bell pepper, cumin, and paprika.
Add olives and raisins.
Fill empanada dough with mixture and seal edges.
Fry until golden brown or bake according to package instructions.
Serve with salsa or dipping sauce.

boeufBourguignon.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
steps: Toss beef with flour and brown in olive oil.
Remove beef and cook onion, carrots, and garlic.
Add wine, broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaf.
Return beef to pot and simmer for 1.5 hours.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

pastaCarbonara.name: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook pancetta in olive oil until crispy.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat and mix in egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley.

moussaka.name: Moussaka
steps: Fry eggplant slices in olive oil and set aside.
Cook lamb with onion and garlic, then add tomato sauce, wine, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Layer eggplant and lamb mixture in a baking dish.
Top with bechamel sauce and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45 minutes.

porkAdobo.name: Pork Adobo
steps: Marinate pork in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Cook pork with marinade, water, onion, bay leaves, peppercorns, and sugar until tender.
Season with salt and serve.

padThai.name: Pad Thai
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook shrimp until pink and set aside.
Scramble eggs in the same pan.
Add garlic and chili, then stir in fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar.
Add noodles, bean sprouts, and shrimp.
Toss with peanuts and green onions.
Serve with lime wedges.

molePoblano.name: Mole Poblano
steps: Heat oil and cook onion and garlic until softened.
Blend chiles with chicken broth and add to pan.
Stir in cocoa powder, peanut butter, tomato sauce, cinnamon, and cumin.
Simmer for 20 minutes until thickened.
Season with salt.

goulash.name: Goulash
steps: Heat oil and brown beef cubes.
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper and cook until softened.
Stir in paprika and caraway seeds.
Add tomato sauce and beef broth.
Simmer for 1 hour until beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

arrozConPollo.name: Arroz Con Pollo
steps: Brown chicken in a pan and set aside.
Cook onion, bell pepper, and garlic until softened.
Stir in rice, tomato sauce, and cumin.
Add chicken broth, saffron, and chicken.
Simmer until rice is cooked.
Stir in green peas and season with salt and pepper.

rakija.name: Rakija
steps: Mash plums and mix with sugar.
Add water and yeast, then ferment for 2 weeks.
Distill the mixture to produce rakija.

tapas.name: Tapas
steps: Arrange olives, chorizo, cheese, almonds, and artichokes on a platter.
Serve with tomato salsa and enjoy.

churros.name: Churros
steps: Heat water and butter until boiling.
Add flour and stir until mixture forms a ball.
Allow to cool slightly, then mix in eggs and vanilla.
Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden.
Roll in sugar and cinnamon.

panzanella.name: Panzanella
steps: Toast bread cubes in olive oil.
Combine bread, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion.
Whisk olive oil and vinegar and toss with salad.
Garnish with basil, salt, and pepper.

laksa.name: Laksa
steps: Cook chicken and set aside.
In a pot, cook laksa paste in coconut milk until fragrant.
Add chicken broth and fish sauce, then simmer.
Add noodles and cook until tender.
Top with chicken, bean sprouts, cilantro, and lime wedges.

potatoLeekSoup.name: Potato Leek Soup
steps: Heat olive oil and cook leeks, onion, and garlic until softened.
Add potatoes and broth, then simmer until potatoes are tender.
Blend soup until smooth and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

risottoMushroom.name: Risotto with Mushrooms
steps: Cook mushrooms in olive oil and set aside.
In the same pan, cook onion until translucent.
Add rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in wine and stir until absorbed.
Add broth gradually, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy.
Stir in mushrooms, Parmesan, and butter.
Season with salt and pepper.

beefStroganoff.name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Cook beef in butter until browned and set aside.
In the same pan, cook onion, garlic, and mushrooms.
Add broth, mustard, and return beef to pan.
Stir in sour cream and heat through.
Season with salt and pepper.

sauerbraten.name: Sauerbraten
steps: Marinate beef in vinegar, water, onion, garlic, carrots, bay leaves, sugar, and juniper berries for 3 days.
Remove beef and brown in a pan.
Add marinade and simmer for 2 hours.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

pavlova.name: Pavlova
steps: Preheat oven to 275°F (135°C).
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Gradually add sugar, vanilla, and lemon juice.
Fold in cornstarch.
Shape meringue into a disk and bake for 1 hour.
Cool, then top with whipped cream, berries, and mint leaves.

couscous.name: Couscous
steps: Bring water, olive oil, and salt to a boil.
Add couscous and remove from heat.
Cover and let sit for 5 minutes.
Fluff with a fork and stir in raisins, almonds, and parsley.

ramen.name: Ramen
steps: Heat sesame oil and cook garlic until fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce, and miso paste.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
Divide noodles into bowls, pour broth over them, and top with spinach, green onion, egg, and nori.

gyoza.name: Gyoza
steps: Mix pork, cabbage, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic.
Place a small amount of filling in each gyoza wrapper and fold to seal.
Heat oil in a pan and fry gyoza until bottoms are golden.
Add water to the pan and cover to steam for 5 minutes.

crepes.name: Crepes
steps: Mix flour, eggs, milk, melted butter, sugar, and salt until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet and lightly grease with butter.
Pour a small amount of batter into the pan and swirl to coat.
Cook until edges are golden, then flip and cook the other side.

chickenEnchiladas.name: Chicken Enchiladas
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Heat oil and cook onion until softened.
Mix chicken with cumin, salt, and pepper.
Fill tortillas with chicken, roll, and place in a baking dish.
Top with enchilada sauce and cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes until cheese is melted.
Serve with sour cream.

beefWellington.name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear beef in olive oil until browned on all sides.
Cook mushrooms, onion, and garlic until moisture is evaporated.
Spread mustard on beef and cool.
Wrap beef in prosciutto and mushroom mixture.
Wrap in puff pastry and brush with egg.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 25 minutes.

kimchiFriedRice.name: Kimchi Fried Rice
steps: Heat sesame oil and cook onion and garlic.
Add kimchi and cook until heated.
Add rice, kimchi juice, and soy sauce.
Stir well and cook until rice is heated through.
Fry eggs and place on top of rice.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.

falafel.name: Falafel
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight and drain.
Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cilantro, cumin, coriander, baking powder, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Form into balls and fry until golden brown.

stuffedBellPeppers.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Cook ground beef, onion, and garlic until browned.
Mix with rice, tomato sauce, and Italian seasoning.
Stuff peppers with mixture and top with cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes.

chickenSchnitzel.name: Chicken Schnitzel
steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Dredge in flour, then egg, then bread crumbs.
Heat oil in a pan and cook chicken until golden and cooked through.
Serve with lemon wedges.

lambTagine.name: Lamb Tagine
steps: Brown lamb in a pot.
Add onion, garlic, ginger, and spices, and cook until fragrant.
Add apricots, broth, and simmer until lamb is tender.
Top with almonds and cilantro.

ceviche.name: Ceviche
steps: Marinate fish in lime juice for 2 hours.
Mix with onion, tomato, cilantro, and jalapeño.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

bangersAndMash.name: Bangers and Mash
steps: Cook sausages in a pan until browned.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with milk and butter.
Cook onion until softened, then add gravy and heat through.
Serve sausages over mashed potatoes with gravy.

shepherdsPie.name: Shepherd's Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Cook ground meat, onion, and carrots until browned.
Add tomato paste and beef broth, and simmer until thickened.
Add peas and season with salt and pepper.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with milk and butter.
Spread meat mixture in a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes.
Bake for 25 minutes until top is golden.

chanaMasala.name: Chana Masala
steps: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger until softened.
Add tomato sauce and spices, and cook until thickened.
Add chickpeas and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

jollofRice.name: Jollof Rice
steps: Cook onion, garlic, and bell pepper until softened.
Add tomato paste, diced tomatoes, thyme, and curry powder.
Add rice and broth, and simmer until rice is cooked.

butterChicken.name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Cook chicken in butter until browned.
Add tomato sauce, cream, and spices, and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

tabbouleh.name: Tabbouleh
steps: Soak bulgur in water until tender.
Mix with parsley, mint, tomato, and cucumber.
Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

vegetableSamosa.name: Vegetable Samosa
steps: Heat oil in a pan, cook cumin seeds, garlic, and onion until softened.
Add potatoes, green peas, coriander seeds, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook for a few minutes.
Allow the filling to cool.
Fill the samosa pastry with the mixture and seal the edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

muttonSamosa.name: Mutton Samosa
steps: Heat oil in a pan, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until softened.
Add ground mutton, cumin seeds, coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until mutton is browned and cooked through.
Allow the filling to cool.
Fill the samosa pastry with the mutton mixture and seal the edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

chickenSamosa.name: Chicken Samosa
steps: Heat oil in a pan, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until softened.
Add ground chicken, cumin seeds, coriander powder, garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until chicken is cooked through and the mixture is dry.
Allow the filling to cool.
Fill the samosa pastry with the chicken mixture and seal the edges.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.
